decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Block plan, elevations, and floor plan; unnumbered and undated; received 13/11/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - All waste, refuse, and recycling bins shall be stored inside the curtilage of the building and shall not be moved outside except to an awaiting vehicle after which they shall be immediately returned to inside the curtilage of the building.  No refuse or recyclable materials shall be stored outside the building's curtilage.
description: Demolition of existing rear garage and store and erection of a single storey rear extension to the building and a retrospective application for change of use from shop A1 to computer training centre
